author: razor
name: Midnight
description:
To add this theme just extract the zip and place the Midnight file in either "~/.themes/" or "/.usr/share/themes/"

-----

V 1.2

- new close button

- new thumbnail

- fix on button color

V 1.1

- calendar arrows now smaller

- add workspace switcher is now darker

- workspace switcher applet now has proper inset shadow

-----

wallpaper: Deep Blue by IrvingGFM - http://irvinggfm.deviantart.com/art/Deep-Blue-200575866

Icons - http://tiheum.deviantart.com/art/Faience-icon-theme-255099649
